TopicTitle: Race into Space: C413B VS MineAheadTV

Articles.Content: My friend, who wants to get into twitch streaming, will be competing with me tomorrow in a race of sorts. This is our first time doing this, we may do this sort of thing more if it is fun and gets some good response. I will be attempting to go to Duna and back with FAR, DRE, and TAC life support. He will be attempting to reach the moon (something he has not done before) using the stock game. We will most likely be doing this starting with nothing in career mode, adding to the challenge. Hope to see many of you there! Starts at 5:00 EST tomorrow, June 26 2014
